name: Faerie Turnabout
description:
Made for the GDB Juice Jam II. A game about taking happiness from others. Faeries are trying to steal a hard earned trophy of yours, so you take a gun gifted to you by a benevolent contractor, and steal their happiness in retribution! After all, in order to prepare for further onslaughts, better contract benefits come at a tax on your happiness as well...

Controls: W/Space - Jump: A/Left - Left: D/Right - Right: Left Click - Shoot: P/Esc - Pause/Shop
